articles.title: DPRK Government Delegation Leaves for Azerbaijan
articles.content:
DPRK Government Delegation Leaves for Azerbaijan
 Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- A DPRK government delegation headed by Foreign Minister Ri Yong Ho left here Tuesday to participate in the foreign minister's conference of the non-aligned movement to be held in Azerbaijan and visit Russia and countries of the Commonwealth of Independent States.

articles.title: DPRK Sports Minister Meets His S. Korean Counterpart
articles.content:
DPRK Sports Minister Meets His S. Korean Counterpart
 Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- Kim Il Guk, minister of Physical Culture and Sports, met and had a talk with To Jong Hwan, minister of Culture, Sports and Tourism who is heading the visiting art troupe of the south side, in a compatriotic atmosphere at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Monday.
					 The talk discussed the practical matters for reenergizing exchange in the field of sports between the north and the south of Korea.

articles.title: North, South Taekwon-do Demonstration Groups Perform Together
articles.content:
North, South Taekwon-do Demonstration Groups Perform Together
 Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- A joint demonstration performance of the north and the south Taekwon-do demonstration groups of Korea was given at the Pyongyang Grand Theatre Monday.
					 Watching the performance were Choe Hwi, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea who is chairman of the National Sports Guidance Committee (NSGC), Ri Il Hwan, department director of the WPK Central Committee and vice-chairman of the NSGC, Kim Kyong Ho, chairman of the Korean Taekwon-Do Committee, officials concerned, sportspersons and Pyongyang citizens.
					
					 Also watching it were the south side art troupe including To Jong Hwan, minister of Culture, Sports and Tourism, and leading members of the Taekwon-do demonstration group.
					
					 The members of the Taekwon-do demonstration group from the south side displayed their diverse martial art skills and methods to the tune of music.
					
					 They satisfactorily performed Taekwon-do movements requiring high techniques with the use of attack and defence skills, including various attack movements and diverse defeating movements, to be applauded by the spectators.
					
					 The members of the Taekwon-do demonstration group from the north side perfectly performed every detail of pattern movements, exciting the spectators.
					
					 They showed well the might of our Taekwon-do through the demonstration of self-defense art by which they put under control the enemies in an instant by the use of refined techniques such as accurate attack, crushing and throwing down.
					
					 The members of our Taekwon-do demonstration group broke bricks, tiles, granite slates with explosive strength to be applauded by the spectators.
					
					 The dynamic group pattern movements of the members of the demonstration groups of the north and the south decorated the end of the demonstration performance.
					
					 At the end of the performance, the spectators waved their hands and warmly congratulated the Taekwon-do players.

articles.title: S. Side Taekwon-do Demonstration Group Performs Here
articles.content:
S. Side Taekwon-do Demonstration Group Performs Here 
Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- A demonstration performance of the Taekwon-do demonstration group of the south side was given at the Taekwon-Do Hall Sunday.
					Watching it were Choe Hwi, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and chairman of the National Sports Guidance Committee, and Kim Yong Ho, secretary general of the Cabinet, Kim Kyong Ho, chairman of the Korean Taekwon-Do Committee, officials concerned, sportspersons and Pyongyang citizens.
					
					Also watching it were leading members of the demonstration group.
					
					The members of the demonstration group showed diverse martial art techniques and methods to the tune of music.
					
					Whenever they skillfully showed Taekwon-Do technical movements through attack and defence methods including diverse movements and other movements for defeating targets in different positions, the spectators applauded them with warm compatriotism.
					
					At the end of the demonstration performance, Choe Hwi and our officials concerned and the leading members of the south side Taekwon-Do demonstration group met and congratulated the performers.

articles.title: Seminar of Social Scientists
articles.content:
Seminar of Social Scientists
 Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- A seminar of social scientists took place at the People's Palace of Culture here Tuesday to mark the 25th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election to the post of the chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK.
					 Present there were Ri Hye Jong, president of the Academy of Social Sciences, teachers, researchers, lecturers, journalists, editors and officials in the fields of science, education, press, preservation of revolutionary relics and party cadre training organs.
					
					 Presented to the seminar were papers that proved the revolutionary exploits of Kim Jong Il who developed the DPRK into a socialist state of Juche with invincible might.
					
					 The speakers stressed that Kim Jong Il is a peerlessly great man possessed of qualifications and traits as a state leader on the highest level.
					
					 He strengthened the DPRK government into a powerful political entity which guides in a bold way the army and people's heroic struggle for creation and construction, they noted.
					
					 They said that under his Songun leadership, the Korean People's Army had further strengthened into a powerful revolutionary army each soldier of which is a match for a hundred foes and which could reliably defend the security of the socialist country and its people.
					
					 They evinced their resolve to make active contributions to winning fresh victories on all fronts of building a powerful socialist country this year under the guidance of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un while glorifying Kim Jong Il's idea and exploits for the building of a socialist state.

articles.title: Foreign Artistes, Members of International Jury Arrive
articles.content:
Foreign Artistes, Members of International Jury Arrive
 Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- Artistes of Russia, Mongolia, Bulgaria and Kazakhstan and international jury members of Russia, Germany and Chile arrived here on Tuesday to attend the First Pyongyang International Vocal Competition.

articles.title: Delegation of "Prominent Personages in Asia" Arrives
articles.content:
Delegation of "Prominent Personages in Asia" Arrives
Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- A delegation of "Prominent Personages in Asia" headed by Dino Patti Djalal, founder of the Foreign Policy Community of Indonesia, arrived here on Tuesday.

articles.title: Efficient Corn Planter Introduced in DPRK
articles.content:
Efficient Corn Planter Introduced in DPRK
 Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- Cooperative farms in different parts of the DPRK are making wide use of efficient farming machines in spring.
					 Among them is corn planter developed by the Farm Machine Institute under the Ministry of Agriculture.
					
					 The planter has been introduced into the cooperative farms in Sadong District, Pyongyang City and Jungsan County in South Phyongan Province and many other cooperative farms to be highly appreciated.
					
					 The labor-saving one helps economize many seeds, put farming process on an intensive basis. It can be used even in sloping fields.
					
					 It can also be used in sowing bean, sunflower and other seeds.
					
					 It scientifically ensures seed number per plant, space between plants and depth of seed burying in ground, thus increasing germination rate.
					
					 The light planter is simple in structure and operation principle.
					
					 According to Kim Song Ho, section chief of the institute, scientists of the institute are working hard to manufacture various kinds of efficient farming machines suited to natural and topographical features of the country and constitution of the Koreans.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Urged to Behave with Discretion: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Urged to Behave with Discretion: KCNA Commentary 
 Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- The south Korean authorities have been unhesitatingly engrossed in dishonest acts behind the scene of dialogue.
					 When a "human rights resolution" against the DPRK was adopted, under the manipulation of the hostile forces including the U.S. and Japan, at the 37th meeting of the UN Human Rights Council on March 23, the south Korean authorities let a foreign ministry spokesman to express the stand to "join the sustained efforts of the international community for the improvement of the human rights situation in the north", welcoming it.
					
					 This is an open political provocation to the DPRK and an intolerable act of chilling the atmosphere for dialogue.
					
					 The anti-DPRK "human rights resolution" the hostile forces cooked up again is a product of the crimes and plot-breeding to tarnish the sovereignty and dignity of the DPRK by going extremes to demonize it and, at the same time, to ratchet up international sanctions and pressure with it as a pretext and furthermore realize "regime change".
					
					 The hostile forces have regarded it as a key leverage for realizing their hegemonic strategy to use the "human rights" issue for making interference in the internal affairs of other countries. They have also zealously used it for their anti-DPRK racket.
					
					 Nevertheless, the south Korean authorities are chiming in with those forces. 
					
					 Truly dubious is the double-dealing attitude of the south Korean authorities who are calling for dialogue but trumpeting about "human rights in the north" behind the scene.
					
					 Whom are they going to hold dialogue with and whom are they going to improve relations with while denying the dignity and social system of the dialogue partner?
					
					 It is an anachronistic foolish behavior for them to still beat the drum of the "north's human rights issue" the same way as was done by the Lee Myung Bak and Park Geun Hye group of traitors for confrontation between systems and for anti-reunification policy in the past.
					
					 As even Americans, who visited the DPRK, have praised it as a paradise for the people which can hardly be found in any other part of the world, Korean-style socialism centered on the popular masses is advancing with firm confidence more vigorously than ever before.
					
					 Shunning such human rights performance in the DPRK, the south Korean authorities dance to the tune of the hostile forces. Is their act in line with the precious atmosphere for reconciliation prevailing in the north and the south of Korea? 
					
					 They should clearly understand that slandering the human rights performance in the north, an act of getting on the nerves of the dialogue partner at the present time when everything is at the beginning, will be tantamount to an act of throwing a stone to the thin ice-like north-south relations.
					
					 The south Korean authorities have to exercise special deliberation and behave with discretion.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Warns Japan against Going Reckless
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Warns Japan against Going Reckless
 Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- The Japanese reactionaries have become all the more pronounced in their moves for arms buildup.
					 Recently the Japan Defense Ministry buckled down to earnest moves to remake escort ship of Maritime "Self-Defense Force" Izumo into a carrier. To this end, it is stepping up the purchase of ultra-modern Stealth fighter F-35 and the introduction of take-off and landing technology from the U.S. and Britain.
					
					 Earlier, the Japan government decided to deploy the U.S. interceptor missile defense system Aegis Ashore on the land of Japan.
					
					 As proven, Japan's arms buildup being pushed forward under the signboards of "exclusive defense" and "re-organization of defense forces" is clearly the indication of increased nature of attack and aggression of the SDF.
					
					 Due to the moves to turn Japan into a military giant that have long been pushed forward, the SDF has undergone remarkable qualitative and quantitative change as perfect attack forces, after going beyond the level of defending the Japan proper.
					
					 This year alone, Japan decided to spend the biggest-ever budget for defense running at 5.1911 trillion yen and even hinted at a budget for long-range cruise missile, preemptive attack weapon, only to touch off controversy.
					
					 In March, the general ground command providing uniform control over all the ground SDF units was formed and amphibious task force was established as a special team for landing operation under the pretext of "defending a remote island in the southwest". All this has been carried out as an extension of the moves to revive the "imperial army" system which earned an ill fame for aggression and plunder.
					
					 Furthermore, the Abe group is thinking of specifying the existence of the SDF in Article 9, a key point of the "pacifist constitution", in order to grant the attack forces legality and provide them with legal ground for an aggression war.
					
					 All facts highlight the danger and severity of the modernization moves of the SDF which is dashing headlong into realizing the ambition for overseas expansion and this has touched off serious concern of the international community.
					
					 A press spokesman for the Defense Ministry of China at a weekly press conference on March 29 said that Japan's tendency in the field of military security has aroused concern of neighboring countries in Asia and the international community for historical reason and other reason in light of reality, adding its tendency to develop attack means which exceeds the need for "exclusive defense" arouses increased vigilance.
					
					 Russia, too, expressed high vigilance against Japan which is getting keen on introducing the U.S. interceptor missile defense system.
					
					 The present times are no longer what they used to be in the past when Japan provoked Sino-Japanese War and Russia-Japanese War at will to contain regional big powers by force and go roughshod over in Asian countries.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries should clearly face up to the high vigilance of the international community and should not follow in the footsteps of their predecessors who were put to shame.
					
					 The SDF can never evade the fate of the Imperial Japanese Army unless it changes its purport of modernization.

articles.title: Anniversary of Popular Uprising on Jeju Island Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of Popular Uprising on Jeju Island Marked
 Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Tuesday dedicates an article to the 70th anniversary of the April 3 Popular Uprising on Jeju Island.
					 The April 3 Popular Uprising was a righteous anti-U.S., anti-fascist resistance to oppose the U.S. imperialists' colonial enslavement policy in south Korea and their moves for national division and achieve democracy of society and national reunification, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 The south Korean people do not allow their aspiration and demand, democratic rights and livelihood to be trampled down by the U.S. and the pro-American conservative forces. They are turning out to decisively punish the aggressors and traitors.
					
					 Just is their struggle to uproot the evils of the conservatives and realize the dream of new politics and new society.
					
					 70 years have passed since the April 3 Popular Uprising on Jeju Island in south Korea. Independence and democracy of the south Korean society and national reunification, so ardently desired by the uprisers, should be realized without fail. 
					
					 The conservative group of south Korea is making last-ditch efforts to seek a way for revival while insulting the April 3 Popular Uprising as "riot by the leftist forces" and justifying its crime-woven history. A severe punishment should be given to the satanic group which is betraying the nation, beautifying the pro-U.S. sycophancy and fascist dictatorship and seeking a way out in confrontation with the fellow countrymen.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Should Behave with Discretion: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Should Behave with Discretion: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, in south Korea there was a confrontational farce called a "ceremony for the day of defending West Sea" at the "State Taejon Hyonchung Cemetery" with the attendance of high-ranking authorities, those concerned with ruling and opposition parties and the commander of the U.S. imperialist aggression forces in south Korea on the lapse of 8 years since the warship Cheonan was sunk.
					 The "prime minister" of south Korea said in his "commemorative address" that the West Sea was exposed to constant threat and even an inch on the sea should not be allowed to be intruded.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun in a commentary Tuesday says that the "ceremony" was an unpardonable confrontational act of throwing a wet blanket over the atmosphere for the improved inter-Korean relations and going against the trend of peace on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 The "ceremony for the day of defending West Sea" is well known to the world as an anti-DPRK confrontational farce invented by the Lee Myung Bak-Park Geun Hye conservative group to completely destroy the north-south relations, the paper says, and goes on.
					
					 Nevertheless, the present south Korean authorities, crying out for combating evils, are chiming in with the anti-DPRK smear incident, fabricated by traitor Lee during his office and embellished by the Park group of traitors. This is, indeed, a funny behavior.
					
					 Worse still, they hosted an anti-DPRK farce and spouted the heinous outburst calling for confrontation in league with conservatives, far from working hard to create atmosphere for national reconciliation and unity as unanimously demanded by the people at home and abroad. Their act invites astonishment and indignation.
					
					 If they keep double-dealing tactics such as talking about dialogue and the improvement of the relations and slandering the dialogue partner behind the scene, there will be no expectation for smooth development of the north-south relations.
					
					 The south Korean authorities would be well advised to behave with discretion, mindful that they may get a serious trouble if they act hastily at the crucial time.

articles.title: "Liberal Korea Party" Has No Future: S. Korean Newspaper
articles.content:
"Liberal Korea Party" Has No Future: S. Korean Newspaper
 Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- The south Korean newspaper Hangyore carried an editorial titled "Liberal Korea Party has no future without repentance for ferry Sewol disaster" on March 30.
					 The editorial noted that the LKP urged the candlelight demonstrators to make an apology who demanded a probe into the truth behind the sinking of the ferry, while not repenting of the results of the investigation made by the prosecution into the 7-hour behavior of Park Geun Hye at the time of the ferry Sewol disaster.
					
					 On the day of the disaster, Park appeared at her office after four in the afternoon and cooked up the reporting time and defied the demand of the bereaved families for the probe into her 7-hour behavior, it charged.
					
					 The LKP has no future as it tries to evade and cover up the crimes during its rule as evidenced by the ferry Sewol disaster.
					
					 The editorial urged the LKP to thoroughly repent of its crimes before the people as regards the disaster and make sincere apology to the bereaved families.

articles.title: Red Herrings by Park Geun Hye Group Disclosed in S. Korea
articles.content:
Red Herrings by Park Geun Hye Group Disclosed in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- Red herrings cooked up by the traitorous Park Geun Hye group were disclosed, according to news reports from south Korea. The group mobilized media to beautify its unpopular rule and cover up the scandals during her stay in power.
					 A committee for reforming administration of employment and labor made public on March 28 the results of investigation into the red herring operation committed by the Park Geun Hye group to justify its policy for retrogressive revision of labor law by using MBC.
					
					 The MBC headquarters of the press union charged that the Park's regime and its servants destroyed the function of a public broadcasting service for democracy, urging thorough probe into the truth and punishment of those responsible.
					
					 It was also disclosed that U Pyong U, former chief secretary for civil administration of Chongwadae, cooked up red herring by dint of power to calm down the mounting protest against scandals of his clans in 2016.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Syria
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Syria
 Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- The Al Baath of Syria brought out in booklet leader Kim Jong Il's work "Kimilsungia Is an Immortal Flower Blooming in the Hearts of Humankind in the Era of Independence" on the occasion of the Day of the Sun, the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The work, published on April 6, Juche 94 (2005), deals with the historic position of Kimilsungia and significance of its cultivation and indicates the tasks for bringing the flower of the sun, a treasure common to mankind, into full bloom everywhere in Korea.
					
					 A book-releasing ceremony took place on March 27.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Marked in Serbia
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Marked in Serbia
 Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- A Serbian national preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung, the Day of the Sun, was formed on Mar. 23.
					 Marijann Kubik, international secretary of the New Yugoslav Communist Party, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee fixed a celebration period from Mar. 23 to April 15 and decided to hold colorful political and cultural events such as seminar and film show in praise of the revolutionary career and feats of the President in the period.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Birth Anniversary to Be Celebrated in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Birth Anniversary to Be Celebrated in Russia
 Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung was formed by the Lenin Young Communist League of the Russian Federation on March 22.
					 V. P. Isakov, first secretary of the Central Committee of the league, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The preparatory committee set a celebration period from March 22 to April 16 and decided to organize colorful political and cultural events praising Kim Il Sung's revolutionary career and exploits in the period.

articles.title: Delegacion coreana parte de Pyongyang
articles.content:
Delegacion coreana parte de Pyongyang 
Pyongyang, 3 de abril (ACNC) -- La delegacion del gobierno de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, encabezada por el ministro de Relaciones Exteriores Ri Yong Ho, partio hoy de esta capital para participar en la reunion de cancilleres del MNOAL a efectuarse en Azerbaijan y realizar una gira por Rusia y los paises de la Comunidad de Estados Independientes.

articles.title: Kim Il Guk se reune con To Jong Hwan
articles.content:
Kim Il Guk se reune con To Jong Hwan
Pyongyang, 3 de abril (ACNC) -- El ministro de Deportes, Kim Il Guk, departio el dia 2 en un ambiente fraternal en el Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae con el ministro de Cultura, Deporte y Turismo, To Jong Hwan, quien se encuentra de visita en Pyongyang como jefe del grupo de artistas del Sur de Corea.
					En la ocasion, se discutieron los problemas practicos para activar el intercambio en el sector deportivo entre ambas partes coreanas.

articles.title: Tiene lugar en Pyongyang la demostracion conjunta Norte-Sur de Taekwondo
articles.content:
Tiene lugar en Pyongyang la demostracion conjunta Norte-Sur de Taekwondo
Pyongyang, 3 de abril (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 2 en el Gran Teatro de Pyongyang la actuacion conjunta de los grupos de demostracion de Taekwondo del Norte y el Sur de Corea.
					La disfrutaron Choe Hwi, vicepresidente del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y presidente del Comite Estatal de Direccion de Deportes, Ri Il Hwan, jefe de departamento del CC del PTC y vicepresidente del Comite Estatal de Direccion de Deportes, Kim Kyong Ho, presidente del Comite de Taekwondo de Corea, los funcionarios interesados, los deportistas y los capitalinos.
					
					Se distinguian tambien entre el publico los miembros principales del grupo de artistas surcoreanos, inclusive To Jong Hwan, ministro de Cultura, Deporte y Turismo, y del otro de demostracion de Taekwondo del Sur de Corea.
					
					Los taekwondocas surcoreanos pusieron en la escena diversos movimientos tecnicos y metodos del arte marcial al compas de las melodias.
					
					Arrancaron fuertes aplausos sus perfectos movimientos de ataque y defensa de Taekwondo.
					
					Los taekwondocas norcoreanos cumplieron perfectamente los movimientos detallados de patterns dejando muy impresionados a los espectadores.
					
					La defensa personal hizo conocer el poderio de nuestro arte marcial ortodoxo.
					
					Cada vez que los taekwondocas norcoreanos rompian de un golpe y con la fuerza explosiva los ladrillos, las tejas y las planchas de granito, estallaban en la audiencia las aclamaciones y las voces de admiracion.
					
					Los taekwondocas de ambas partes coreanas terminaron la demostracion con los movimientos vigorosos del patterns colectivo.
					
					Terminada la actuacion, los espectadores felicitaron con manos alzadas a los ejecutantes.

articles.title: Tiene lugar la demostracion de taekwondocas surcoreanos
articles.content:
Tiene lugar la demostracion de taekwondocas surcoreanos
Pyongyang, 3 de abril (ACNC) -- Se ofrecio el dia primero en el Palacio de Taekwondo la presentacion del grupo surcoreano de demostracion de Taekwondo.
					La vieron Choe Hwi, vicepresidente del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y presidente del Comite Estatal de Direccion de Deportes, Kim Yong Ho, secretario general del Consejo de Ministros, Kim Kyong Ho, presidente del Comite de Taekwondo de Corea, los funcionarios interesados, los deportistas y los capitalinos.
					
					Estuvieron presentes tambien los miembros principales del grupo surcoreano.
					
					Los taekwondocas surcoreanos cumplieron al compas de la melodia musical variadas tecnicas y metodos marciales.
					
					Cada vez que los deportistas surcoreanos mostraban con excelencia los movimientos tecnicos de Taekwondo que emplean diferentes habilidades y metodos de ataque y defensa, los espectadores les dieron gran aplauso lleno de sentimiento fraternal.
					
					Terminada la demostracion, Choe Hwi y los funcionarios interesados de la RPDC y los miembros principales del grupo surcoreanos felicitaron exitos de los taekwondocas.

articles.title: Arriban a Pyongyang artistas y jueces de varios paises
articles.content:
Arriban a Pyongyang artistas y jueces de varios paises
Pyongyang, 3 de abril (ACNC) -- Llegaron el dia 3 a esta capital los artistas de Rusia, Mongolia, Bulgaria y Kazajstan y los jueces internacionales de Rusia, Alemania y Chile para participar en el Primer Concurso Internacional de Musica Vocal de Pyongyang.
